seo.title: Robin Duda - The @codingchili portfolio.
seo.description: Robin Duda is a software developer working on a lot of open source projects with friendly licensing. Dancing ninja style on the cutting edge of new technology and libraries.

whoami.description: Software developer working on a lot of open source projects with friendly licensing. I'm interested in a lot of things but is currently working with Vert.x, Hazelcast, ElasticSearch, Web Components, Polymer, CQEngine, Web app security, aiohttp/asyncio and even some Android.Mostly using Java, Python and JavaScript for web development but trying to learn some Kotlin on Android and Vyper for the EVM. I like microservices and Docker and dislike application servers and object relational mappers.

projects.name: Zapperfly Assembler
projects.description: Zapperfly assembler is a clustered build server that aims to be small and easy to customize without relying on third party plugins.

projects.name: Mouse Enigma
projects.description: An Android password manager with support for using your fingerprint as biometric authentication. Passwords are hashed with Scrypt and encrypted with a AES256 key stored in the trusted execution environment.

projects.name: Kibana Mithril
projects.description: A plugin for Kibana that adds authentication to access the user interface. Works with LDAP and has support for 2-factor authentication. Users may be stored in a local json file, MongoDB or LDAP.

projects.name: Excelastic
projects.description: Excelastic is a web interface and commandline utility to load data into ElasticSearch. It supports xlsx/xls and CSV files and focuses on ease of use.

projects.name: Ethereum Ingest
projects.description: Ethereum ingest is an ingest utility capable of importing events from the Ethereum blockchain into ElasticSearch, MongoDB, Hazelcast and CQEngine.

projects.name: Cartlet
projects.description: An E-commerce platform built on an older stack (2015) and completely refurbished in 2018! Upgraded security, performance, design, code style and dependencies to rock harder than ever.

projects.name: Unicorn Analytics
projects.description: Pulls statistics from google analytics API's and visualizes it on a Pimoroni Unicorn hat HD.
